RNS Number : 2949M
AVEVA Group PLC
20 January 2021
 

 

AVEVA Group plc

Director/PDMR Shareholding

 

AVEVA Group plc (the "Company") announces that on 19 January 2021, Peter Herweck, a Non-Executive Director of the Company, sold a total of 7,111 ordinary shares at a price of £38.13 per share.

 

Enquiries:
